org.apache.tamaya.core.internal

Class DefaultConfigurationProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.tamaya.core.internal.DefaultConfigurationProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationProviderSpi

    public class DefaultConfigurationProvider
extends Object
implements ConfigurationProviderSpi
    Implementation of the Configuration API. This class uses the current ConfigurationContext to evaluate the chain of PropertySource and PropertyFilter instance to evaluate the current Configuration.

      • createConfiguration

        public Configuration createConfiguration(ConfigurationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Create a Configuration instance using the given context. The configuration created hereby must respect the artifacts provided by its context (property sources, filters, converters, policies etc), including their ordering and significance.
        Specified by:
        createConfiguration in interface ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Parameters:
        context - the context to be used, not null.
        Returns:
        the corresponding configuration instance.

      • getConfigurationContextBuilder

        public ConfigurationContextBuilder getConfigurationContextBuilder()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Creates a new ConfigurationContextBuilder instance.
        Specified by:
        getConfigurationContextBuilder in interface ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Returns:
        a new ConfigurationContextBuilder, never null.

      • setConfiguration

        public void setConfiguration(Configuration config)
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi
        This method allows to replace the current Configuration with a new instance. This can be used to update the configuration with a new one, e.g. because some of the data has changed and must be updated. It is the responsibility of the ConfigurationProvider to trigger corresponding update events for the current Configuration.
        Specified by:
        setConfiguration in interface ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Parameters:
        config - the new Configuration to be applied.

      • isConfigurationSettable

        public boolean isConfigurationSettable()
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Method that allows to determine if a new Configuration can be applied programmatically.
        Specified by:
        isConfigurationSettable in interface ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Returns:
        true, if ConfigurationProviderSpi.setConfiguration(org.apache.tamaya.Configuration) is supported by the current implementation.
        See Also:
        ConfigurationProviderSpi.setConfiguration(org.apache.tamaya.Configuration)

      • getConfigurationContext

        @Deprecated
public ConfigurationContext getConfigurationContext()
        Deprecated. use Configuration.getContext() instead.
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Get access to the current ConfigurationContext.
        Specified by:
        getConfigurationContext in interface ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Returns:
        the current ConfigurationContext, never null.

      • setConfigurationContext

        @Deprecated
public void setConfigurationContext(ConfigurationContext context)
        Deprecated. the context should be given upon creation of the Configuration
        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi
        This method allows to replace the current ConfigurationContext with a new instance. This can be used to update the context with a new one, e.g. because some of the configuration data has changed and must be updated. It is the responsibility of the ConfigurationProvider to trigger corresponding update event for the current ConfigurationContext or Configuration.
        Specified by:
        setConfigurationContext in interface ConfigurationProviderSpi
        Parameters:
        context - the new ConfigurationContext to be applied.

public boolean isConfigurationContextSettable()

        Description copied from interface: ConfigurationProviderSpi

        Returns:

        See Also:
        ConfigurationProviderSpi.setConfigurationContext(org.apache.tamaya.spi.ConfigurationContext)
